CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
CurrentVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
OldVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Matched items in audit logs
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability you will get visibility into matched condition and value in Audit Logs as a result of a DLP policy match.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Matched items in audit logs
OldVersion.description: With this capability you will get visibility into matched condition and value in Audit Logs as a result of a DLP policy match.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
OldVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel
Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to
co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.
Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless
of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes
automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
OldVersion.description:
Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel
Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to
co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.
Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless
of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes
automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update,
admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases,
and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove
inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various
signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as
IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management
enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies,
governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design,
users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit
logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
OldVersion.description:
,With this update,
admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases,
and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove
inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various
signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as

enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies,
governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design,
users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit
logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
OldVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Monthly search report
CurrentVersion.description: The monthly search report provides key tenant search metrics and insights for your organization directly into the search admin’s mailbox, allowing administrators an easy way to understand how search performed in the previous month. Administrators can follow links provided in the report to the Search & Intelligence Admin Center for more information and deeper insights.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Monthly search report
OldVersion.description: The monthly search report provides key tenant search metrics and insights for your organization directly into the search admin’s mailbox, allowing administrators an easy way to understand how search performed in the previous month. Administrators can follow links provided in the report to the Search & Intelligence Admin Center for more information and deeper insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their information in chat, meetings, calls, and more with AI. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter free text questions to quickly synthesize information.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their information in chat, meetings, and calls, with the ability to ask Copilot any question and discover insights. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter a free text question of your own.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
CurrentVersion.description:
Users
can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they
are a part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Customize default verticals, add verticals and filters
CurrentVersion.description: New support for Microsoft Search allows you to customize out of the box verticals for Microsoft Search and add new verticals and filters based on SharePoint content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Customize default verticals, add verticals and filters
OldVersion.description: New support for Microsoft Search allows you to customize out of the box verticals for Microsoft Search and add new verticals and filters based on SharePoint content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and
stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need,
all in one hub of content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified fun picker
OldVersion.description:
Users can now find all their emojis, GIFs, and
stickers in a combined picker. Browse and discover all the fun stuff you need,
all in one hub of content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams calendar on
mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the
participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the
duration of the meeting.
